dataList.dlg: My name is Outis. I hope you'll remember it well, Executive Manager.
A fine morning, Executive Manager! Have you had your breakfast? You seem concerningly feeble; allow me to remind you that it's important to have a balanced diet!
An outstanding leader such as you should not be subjected to the pathetic humiliation of eating all by yourself! I shall join you in your table!
I advise you to sleep early in order to take on tomorrow's tasks in good shape.
While I am busy, I am fully willing to pause all my ongoing tasks if you summon me.
How much are you ready to sacrifice for victory, manager? How much of yourself are you willing to let go if it means you can win?
The absurdity of having to carry out missions with rookies who haven't set a foot in a real battle... Ah, I am most definitely not referring to you, Executive Manager.
Executive Manager? It's dangerous to go out alone, especially for someone who is as incapable in combat as you are!
I will make a sortie right away.
Outis, joining the battle.
Do you have any business with me, Executive Manager?
As you order.
The plan is going smoothly.
Ugh!
A sound strategy.
Rookies.
This victory can only be attributed to your excellent planning.
The fault is mineâ€¦
Splendid as always, Executive Manager!
This was 99% your brilliant leadership and 1% my competence!
In any case, it's neither of our fault, Executive Manager.
